When the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall bring<S>935</S> thee into the land<S>776</S> whither thou goest<S>935</S> to possess<S>3423</S> it, and hath cast out<S>5394</S> many<S>7227</S> nations<S>1471</S> before<S>6440</S> thee, the Hittites<S>2850</S>, and the Girgashites<S>1622</S>, and the Amorites<S>567</S>, and the Canaanites<S>3669</S>, and the Perizzites<S>6522</S>, and the Hivites<S>2340</S>, and the Jebusites<S>2983</S>, seven<S>7651</S> nations<S>1471</S> greater<S>7227</S> and mightier<S>6099</S> than thou;
And when the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall deliver<S>5414</S> them before<S>6440</S> thee; thou shalt smite<S>5221</S> them, and utterly<S>2763</S> destroy<S>2763</S> them; thou shalt make<S>3772</S> no covenant<S>1285</S> with them, nor shew mercy<S>2603</S> unto them:
Neither shalt thou make marriages<S>2859</S> with them; thy daughter<S>1323</S> thou shalt not give<S>5414</S> unto his son<S>1121</S>, nor his daughter<S>1323</S> shalt thou take<S>3947</S> unto thy son<S>1121</S>.
For they will turn away<S>5493</S> thy son<S>1121</S> from following<S>310</S> me, that they may serve<S>5647</S> other<S>312</S> gods<S>430</S>: so will the anger<S>639</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> be kindled<S>2734</S> against you, and destroy<S>8045</S> thee suddenly<S>4118</S>.
But thus shall ye deal<S>6213</S> with them; ye shall destroy<S>5422</S> their altars<S>4196</S>, and break down<S>7665</S> their images<S>4676</S>, and cut down<S>1438</S> their groves<S>842</S>, and burn<S>8313</S> their graven images<S>6456</S> with fire<S>784</S>. <sup>their images: Heb. their statues, or, pillars</sup>
For thou art an holy<S>6918</S> people<S>5971</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>: the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> hath chosen<S>977</S> thee to be a special<S>5459</S> people<S>5971</S> unto himself, above all people<S>5971</S> that are upon the face<S>6440</S> of the earth<S>127</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> did not set his love<S>2836</S> upon you, nor choose<S>977</S> you, because ye were more<S>7230</S> in number than any people<S>5971</S>; for ye were the fewest<S>4592</S> of all people<S>5971</S>:
But because the LORD<S>3068</S> loved<S>160</S> you, and because he would keep<S>8104</S> the oath<S>7621</S> which he had sworn<S>7650</S> unto your fathers<S>1</S>, hath the LORD<S>3068</S> brought you out<S>3318</S> with a mighty<S>2389</S> hand<S>3027</S>, and redeemed<S>6299</S> you out of the house<S>1004</S> of bondmen<S>5650</S>, from the hand<S>3027</S> of Pharaoh<S>6547</S> king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>.
Know<S>3045</S> therefore that the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, he is God<S>430</S>, the faithful<S>539</S> God<S>410</S>, which keepeth<S>8104</S> covenant<S>1285</S> and mercy<S>2617</S> with them that love<S>157</S> him and keep<S>8104</S> his commandments<S>4687</S> to a thousand<S>505</S> generations<S>1755</S>;
And repayeth<S>7999</S> them that hate<S>8130</S> him to their face<S>6440</S>, to destroy<S>6</S> them: he will not be slack<S>309</S> to him that hateth<S>8130</S> him, he will repay<S>7999</S> him to his face<S>6440</S>.
Thou shalt therefore keep<S>8104</S> the commandments<S>4687</S>, and the statutes<S>2706</S>, and the judgments<S>4941</S>, which I command<S>6680</S> thee this day<S>3117</S>, to do<S>6213</S> them.
Wherefore it shall come to pass, if<S>6118</S> ye hearken<S>8085</S> to these judgments<S>4941</S>, and keep<S>8104</S>, and do<S>6213</S> them, that the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall keep<S>8104</S> unto thee the covenant<S>1285</S> and the mercy<S>2617</S> which he sware<S>7650</S> unto thy fathers<S>1</S>: <sup>if: Heb. because</sup>
And he will love<S>157</S> thee, and bless<S>1288</S> thee, and multiply<S>7235</S> thee: he will also bless<S>1288</S> the fruit<S>6529</S> of thy womb<S>990</S>, and the fruit<S>6529</S> of thy land<S>127</S>, thy corn<S>1715</S>, and thy wine<S>8492</S>, and thine oil<S>3323</S>, the increase<S>7698</S> of thy kine<S>504</S>, and the flocks<S>6251</S> of thy sheep<S>6629</S>, in the land<S>127</S> which he sware<S>7650</S> unto thy fathers<S>1</S> to give<S>5414</S> thee.
Thou shalt be blessed<S>1288</S> above all people<S>5971</S>: there shall not be male<S>6135</S> or female barren<S>6135</S> among you, or among your cattle<S>929</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> will take away<S>5493</S> from thee all sickness<S>2483</S>, and will put<S>7760</S> none of the evil<S>7451</S> diseases<S>4064</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, which thou knowest<S>3045</S>, upon thee; but will lay<S>5414</S> them upon all them that hate<S>8130</S> thee.
And thou shalt consume<S>398</S> all the people<S>5971</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall deliver<S>5414</S> thee; thine eye<S>5869</S> shall have no pity<S>2347</S> upon them: neither shalt thou serve<S>5647</S> their gods<S>430</S>; for that will be a snare<S>4170</S> unto thee.
If thou shalt say<S>559</S> in thine heart<S>3824</S>, These nations<S>1471</S> are more<S>7227</S> than I; how<S>349</S> can<S>3201</S> I dispossess<S>3423</S> them?
Thou shalt not be afraid<S>3372</S> of them: but shalt well<S>2142</S> remember<S>2142</S> what the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> did<S>6213</S> unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S>, and unto all Egypt<S>4714</S>;
The great<S>1419</S> temptations<S>4531</S> which thine eyes<S>5869</S> saw<S>7200</S>, and the signs<S>226</S>, and the wonders<S>4159</S>, and the mighty<S>2389</S> hand<S>3027</S>, and the stretched out<S>5186</S> arm<S>2220</S>, whereby the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> brought thee out<S>3318</S>: so shall the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> do<S>6213</S> unto all the people<S>5971</S> of whom thou art afraid<S>3373</S> <S>6440</S>.
Moreover the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> will send<S>7971</S> the hornet<S>6880</S> among them, until they that are left<S>7604</S>, and hide<S>5641</S> themselves from<S>6440</S> thee, be destroyed<S>6</S>.
Thou shalt not be affrighted<S>6206</S> at<S>6440</S> them: for the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> is among<S>7130</S> you, a mighty<S>1419</S> God<S>410</S> and terrible<S>3372</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> will put out<S>5394</S> those<S>411</S> nations<S>1471</S> before<S>6440</S> thee by little<S>4592</S> and little<S>4592</S>: thou mayest<S>3201</S> not consume<S>3615</S> them at once<S>4118</S>, lest the beasts<S>2416</S> of the field<S>7704</S> increase<S>7235</S> upon thee. <sup>put: Heb. pluck off</sup>
But the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall deliver<S>5414</S> them unto thee<S>6440</S>, and shall destroy<S>1949</S> them with a mighty<S>1419</S> destruction<S>4103</S>, until they be destroyed<S>8045</S>. <sup>unto: Heb. before thy face</sup>
And he shall deliver<S>5414</S> their kings<S>4428</S> into thine hand<S>3027</S>, and thou shalt destroy<S>6</S> their name<S>8034</S> from under heaven<S>8064</S>: there shall no man<S>376</S> be able to stand<S>3320</S> before<S>6440</S> thee, until thou have destroyed<S>8045</S> them.
The graven images<S>6456</S> of their gods<S>430</S> shall ye burn<S>8313</S> with fire<S>784</S>: thou shalt not desire<S>2530</S> the silver<S>3701</S> or gold<S>2091</S> that is on them, nor take<S>3947</S> it unto thee, lest thou be snared<S>3369</S> therein: for it is an abomination<S>8441</S> to the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>.
Neither shalt thou bring<S>935</S> an abomination<S>8441</S> into thine house<S>1004</S>, lest thou be a cursed thing<S>2764</S> like it: but thou shalt utterly<S>8262</S> detest<S>8262</S> it, and thou shalt utterly<S>8581</S> abhor<S>8581</S> it; for it is a cursed thing<S>2764</S>.
